Computer Vision Fundamentals for Business Leaders

This publication provides an introduction to Computer Vision, its applications, and challenges for business leaders, aiming to utilize this new form of business intelligence. It explores the potential impact of computer vision on various aspects of a business, including people, products, assets, and documents.
